item.title: A pure Go Blazinly fast PRNG 64 bit ID generator
item.description: Blazinly fast PRNG 64 bit are here Sometimes, we require to have an identifier in order to store things, track behaviours etc. In this scenario, I was required to rapidly generate ID strings in order to be used as Request ID for an HTTP service. Those IDs would be included in HTTP service response X-Request-ID header and tracked in Opentracing. I did some initial implementation and saw a performance degradation that I did not like it.
